entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 March 2023
